column5: i just picked up a maxxum 55lb thrust for $320 including tax.. pretty good deal considering they are normally $420 plus tax there..... i think they will have them at the show and they got some enduras at cheap prices too.. like the 30 was going for $85 i think.. just a reminder for you all that are looking for one!  cheers
Pass that on to my father-in-law.  Thanks
i should add, some are refurbs and some are new..
I would rather buy a Refurbished model at least this way you know that the glitches are fixed.
I've got one of the 30lb enduras in my living room right now...itching to be used!  UF
